query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) not null, [LineNumber] int not null, [RegistrationDate] datetime null, [RegistrationNumber] nvarchar(max) null, [Addressee] nvarchar(max) null, [DepartmentShortName] nvarchar(max) null, [AssigneeName] nvarchar(max) null, [AssigneeDepartmentShortName] nvarchar(max) null, [AssigneeDepartmentName] nvarchar(max) null, [Subject] nvarchar(max) null, [Note] nvarchar(max) null, [CanRead] bit not null)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId varchar(256) not null, LineNumber integer not null, RegistrationDate timestamp null, RegistrationNumber citext null, Addressee citext null, DepartmentShortName citext null, AssigneeName citext null, AssigneeDepartmentShortName citext null, AssigneeDepartmentName citext null, Subject citext null, Note citext null, CanRead boolean not null);

query.default: select RegistrationDate, RegistrationNumber, Addressee, DepartmentShortName, AssigneeName, AssigneeDepartmentShortName, AssigneeDepartmentName, Subject, Note, CanRead from Sungero_Reports_OutgoingDocuments where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by LineNumber;
